rows.messages: [ "Sweating is a normal reaction", "No need to be ashamed." ]
[ "Take a breath, being hot will pass", "You will not faint." ]
[ "The shaking will go away.", "No one can tell you're doing it." ]
[ "Being scared is a feeling.", "It cannot hurt you." ]
[ "Take a step back.", "Try to focus on one thing at a time." ]
[ "You can breathe.", "Feel the air filling your lungs." ]
[ "The twitching will go.", "Do not fight it, acknowledge it and move on." ]
